name: Roe et al. 2004. Estimating Ammonia Emissions from Anthropogenic Nonagricultural Sources - Draft Final Repor
description:
DESCRIPTION
Ammonia emission factors for nonroad engines, combustion of diesel and gasoline in Table III-6, pg 45 (PDF pg 50)

FULL CITATION
Roe, S.M. et al. 2004. Estimating Ammonia Emissions from Anthropogenic Nonagricultural Sources - Draft Final Report. Emission Inventory Improvement Program, U.S. Environmental Protection Agency. April, 2004.
